file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-26-02-04 - SINGLE IRS MODE SELECT UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL SINGLE IRS MODE SELECT UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to remove/install the Mode Select Unit (MSU). B. The MSU is installed on the Control Pedestal. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 34-26-02-000-801-A MODE SELECT UNIT (MSU) - REMOVAL MODE SELECT UNIT (MSU) - INSTALLA- ALL 34-26-02-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-26-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-26-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MODE SELECT UNIT (MSU) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the Mode Select Unit (MSU). B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the IRS circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) On the electrical panel, on the overhead panel, push the BACKUP pushbutton (the striped bar comes on). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Loosen the Dzus fastener (3). (2) Pull the MSU (2) to get access to the electrical connector (1). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (1) from the MSU (2). (4) Remove the MSU (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-26-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Mode Select Unit (MSU) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 224 B DET. A 2. MODE SELECT UNIT (MSU) 3. DZUS 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM340437.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-26-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-26-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. MODE SELECT UNIT (MSU) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the Mode Select Unit (MSU). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 34-26-00-700-801-A/500 SINGLE IRS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the MSU (2). (2) Put the MSU (2) in its installation position. (3) Tighten the Dzus fastener (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 410-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the IRS circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it. (2) On the electrical panel, on the overhead panel, push the BACKUP pushbutton (striped bar comes off). (3) Do the Single IRS operational test (AMM TASK 34-26-00-700-801-A/500).
